title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 6.1 - Beaver and otter trapping seasons and bag limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 6.1 - Beaver and otter trapping seasons and bag limits

State Regulations
(a) Open seasons. No person shall trap beaver
or otter except during the open trapping seasons corresponding to the listed
wildlife management units, or parts of units. Refer to section
4.1
of this Title for a description
of wildlife management units
(1)

Beaver. Open season

Wildlife management units

Closed
1A, 1C, 2A
Nov. 10 - Apr.7
3A, 3C, 3F, 3G, 3H, 3J, 3K, 3M, 3N, 3P, 3R, 3S, 4A, 4B, 4C, 4F, 4G, 4H, 4J, 4K, 4L, 4O, 4P, 4R, 4S, 4T, 4U, 4W, 4Y, 4Z, 5R, 5S, 5T, 6P, 6R, 6S, 7A, 7F, 7H, 7J, 7M, 7P, 7R, 7S, 8A, 8C, 8F, 8G, 8H, 8J, 8M, 8N, 8P, 8R, 8S, 8T, 8W, 8X, 8Y, 9A, 9C, 9F, 9G, 9H, 9J, 9K, 9M, 9N, 9P, 9R, 9S, 9T, 9W, 9X, 9Y
Nov. 1 - Apr. 7
5A, 5C, 5F, 5G, 5H, 5J, 6A, 6C, 6F, 6G, 6H, 6J, 6K, 6N
(2)

Otter. Open season

Wildlife management units

Closed
1A, 1C, 2A, 3A, 4A, 4F, 4G, 4H, 4O, 4P, 4R, 4W, 5R, 6P, 6R, 6S, 7A, 7F, 7H, 7J, 7M, 7P, 7R, 7S, 8A, 8C, 8F, 8G, 8H, 8J, 8M, 8N, 8P, 8R, 8S, 8T, 8W, 8X, 8Y, 9A, 9C, 9F, 9G, 9H, 9J, 9K, 9M, 9N, 9P, 9R, 9S, 9T, 9W, 9X, 9Y
Nov. 10 - Feb. 28
3C, 3F, 3G, 3H, 3J, 3K, 3M, 3N, 3P, 3R, 3S, 4B, 4C, 4J, 4K, 4L, 4S, 4T, 4U, 4Y, 4Z, 5S, 5T
Nov. 1 - Apr. 7
5A, 5C, 5F, 5G, 5H, 5J, 6A, 6C, 6F, 6G, 6H, 6J, 6K, 6N
(b) Beaver season extensions. For any license
year in which the desired number of beaver have not been taken during the
regular open season or during the first part of a split season provided for in
this section, the department may extend the beaver trapping season in any area
or areas of the State. Notice to the affected public of such extension shall be
provided by official department press release or any other means that the
department determines to be appropriate and effective. (c) Bag limits. Beaver and otter may be taken
by trappers in any number during their respective open seasons. Notes
